description: TestRpc embedded in Nethereum to simplify smart contract and Ethereum integration testing.
title: Nethereum.TestRPCRunner

packOptions.summary: TestRpc embedded in Nethereum to simplify smart contract and Ethereum integration testing. It embeds the portable (packed) version of Test Rpc and allows to launch / close on demand any Ethereum Test Rpc server managed by .Net. This is the .netstandard 1.3 version for cross platform usage. You will require to have node installed and your path set. Check Nethereum for unit tests samples.
